name: It's a Match !
description:
It's a Match !

Travelling around the world, Cupidon helps to form couples.
In a town with a lot of unknown soulmates, you'll have to help him making the perfect matches.

To do that, you'll have to click on both soulmate sharing a same outline color, and create their happily ever after ! But be careful, the grey ones do not want or need to be matched !

Play in fullscreen if you want to have the perfect gameplay !


Install instructions

Windows/Linux

-Download the zip file (windows or linux),

-Unzip into a folder,

-Open : 
     for Windows : ItsAMatch.exe
     for Linux : Build_Linux.x86_64

Web

-You can directly play by launching it above
